title: Provider Reimbursement Comparison Matrix
prompt: A worn ledger or financial documents spread across a wooden desk in a small-town clinic office, late afternoon sunlight streaming through a window, casting long shadows across columns of figures and handwritten notes; a pair of reading glasses resting on the papers, a coffee mug nearby, the texture of rural administrative work visible in the detailsâ€”capturing the quiet complexity of financial realities that shape healthcare availability in communities where payment policy determines survival, not just budget margins.
